articles.title: Eric Dane, "Grey's Anatomy" star diagnosed with ALS, dies at 53 - CBS News
articles.description: In April 2025, Eric Dane announced he had been diagnosed​ with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, or ALS.

articles.title: Millie Bobby Brown Shares Rare Photo of Her Daughter for Her Birthday - People.com
articles.description: Millie Bobby Brown celebrates her 22nd birthday with a sweet photo of her baby girl, whom she shares with husband Jake Bongiovi.

articles.title: Arrest of Andrew, brother of King Charles, shakes the House of Windsor - The Washington Post
articles.description: Unlike King Charles I, who was arrested in 1647, Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor will not be executed. But his legal woes and ties to Jeffrey Epstein threaten to damage the royal family.

articles.title: ‘Landman’s Billy Bob Thornton Tells Great Robert Duvall Stories & Divulges The Deep Dark Secret He Never Told His Mentor - Deadline
articles.description: 'Landman' star Billy Bob Thornton tells great stories about his mentor, Robert Duvall, who died February 15 at 95.

articles.title: Is Madewell’s Collaboration With the ‘Denim Whisperer’ Worth It? - The Cut
articles.description: Is the new Madewell x Benjamin Talley Smith capsule collection worth it? I tested three pairs of denim from the highly anticipated collaboration to find out. Read my full review of the wide-leg and straight-leg jeans, here.

articles.title: ‘Knight of the Seven Kingdoms’ Averaging Nearly 13 Million Viewers Per Episode, ‘The Pitt’ Season 2 at 12 Million - Variety
articles.description: HBO and HBO Max programming can take an early victory lap, with both "A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms" and "The Pitt" Season 2 nabbing huge audiences

articles.title: Florida rapper Lil Poppa dies by suicide at 25 - NBC News
articles.description: Florida rapper Lil Poppa has died by suicide, Georgia authorities said.

articles.title: Great job, Internet!: Hollywood uncooked as viral Cruise vs. Pitt video looks like another AI con-job - AV Club

articles.description: The actor stars in a queasy dark comedy as a cast-off member of an aristocratic clan who starts murdering his way through the family ranks in order to get his inheritance.

articles.title: AMC Theatres Won’t Screen AI Short Film ‘Thanksgiving Day’ That Sparked Online Outrage: We Will ‘Not Participate’ - Variety
articles.description: AMC Theatres has opted out of screening the AI-generated short "Thanksgiving Day," which won a film festival contest whose prize involved showcasing the winner at cinemas across the U.S.

articles.title: ‘Toy Story 5’ Trailer: Buzz Lightyear and a Balding Woody Reunite to Rescue Kids From Electronics - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The fifth Pixar film in its Tom Hanks-and-Tim-Allen-voiced franchise flies into theaters June 19.

articles.title: Rhaenyra Is Queen in the New House of the Dragon Trailer - Vulture
articles.description: HBO released a new trailer for the penultimate season of ‘House of the Dragon,’ out this June, which teases the long-awaited Battle of the Gullet.

articles.title: Trump White House Reacts to 'Loser' Springsteen Tour Announcement With So Many Bad Puns - Rolling Stone
articles.description: A White House spokesperson shared a statement filled with a ton of bad puns after Bruce Springsteen called out Trump in his recent tour announcement.

articles.title: Isaiah Zagar, who covered South Philly in murals, dies at 86 - PhillyVoice
articles.description: The artist, known for his mosaics at Philadelphia's Magic Gardens, plastered his work on over 50,000 square feet of space in the city.
